DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate whether pre-treatment metformin IVF increase live birth rate compare placebo woman sonographic evidence polycystic ovary ( PCO ) , without clinical manifestation polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Metformin Treatment Before Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Women With Ultrasound Evidence Polycystic Ovaries
DOC.criteria: Women attend ovulatory PCO due undergo IVF/ICSI treatment . First second cycle IVF/ICSI . If previously metformin , minimum one month washout period require . Polycystic ovary diagnose ultrasound presence ≥12 follicle measure 29 mm diameter least one ovary and/or increase ovarian volume ( ≥10 ml ) . Written informed consent . Clinical manifestation PCOS , include follow : 1 . Oligo amenorrhoea cycle ≥42 day apart . 2 . Anovulation midluteal progesterone < 16 nmol/L . 3 . Biochemical hyperandrogenism serum testosterone ≥3.5 nmol/L and/or free androgen index > 5 ( FAI = [ total testosterone/SHBG ] x 100 ) . 4 . Clinical hyperandrogenism hirsutism acne require treatment least weekly . Age > 38 year . BMI > 35 kg/m2 . Basal FSH > 12 IU/L . Liver disease ALT > 80 IU/L . Renal disease , creatinine > 130 nmol/L . Alcoholism drug abuse . Diabetes mellitus ( evaluated fasting glucose > 6.7mmol/L ) . Per oral steroid treatment last month . Cimetidine , anticoagulation , erythromycin , macrolides last month . Hyperprolactinemia ( Prolactin > 700 mIU/L ) . Abnormal thyroid function test ( TSH outside laboratory normal range ) . Congenital adrenal hyperplasia .
